briefTitle: Vehicle-Controlled Study of SkQ1 as Treatment for Dry-eye Syndrome

outcomeMeasures.title: Ocular Discomfort Scale
outcomeMeasures.description: Change of Ocular Discomfort Scale, scale ranged from 0 to 4 with 0 = No Discomfort and 4 = Constant Discomfort.

outcomeMeasures.title: Conjunctival Fluorescein Staining
outcomeMeasures.description: Change of Conjunctival Fluorescein Staining (sum of temporal and nasal regions), scale in each region ranged from 0 to 4 with 0 = No Staining and 4 = Confluent Staining
